items.title: Offices, outdoor bars, indoor fitness classes, and other activities allowed as SF moves into Orange Tier
items.summary: All patrons must wear face coverings. Reopening places must have additional safety plans in place.

items.title: Starting March 15, SF will expand COVID-19 vaccine eligibility
items.summary: People with severe underlying conditions, disabilities, or live or work in high-risk congregate settings will be eligible.

items.title: Indoor dining, gyms, movie theaters, museums, other activities allowed as SF moves into Red Tier
items.summary: All patrons must wear face coverings. Reopening places must have additional safety plans in place.
